c74object.name: ta.stripvelocity
c74object.digest: Strip velocity values from a midi note list

inlet.description: Given an input note list (pitch and velocity pairs), ta.stripvelocity will send two different lists through each outlet, one containing only pitch values and the other containing only velocity values.

method.name: int
method.description: Received integers are passed directly to both outlets.

method.name: float
method.description: Received floats are floored to integers and passed directly to both outlets.

method.name: list
method.description: Strips a note list (pitch and velocity pairs) by sending pitch values to the left outlet and velocity values to the left outlet.

attribute.name: defer
attribute.description:
"0": execute on high-priority thread.
"1": execute on low-priority thread. (default = 0)

example.caption: Removing velocity values from a note list.

entry.name: int
entry.description:
Out right outlet : If the input is an integer or a float it will be passed directly to this outlet (floats are floored to int). If the input is a list contains one pitch value and one velocity value the velocity will be sent trhough this outlet.
Out left outlet : If the input is an integer or a float it will be passed directly to this outlet (floats are floored to int). If the input is a list contains one pitch value and one velocity value the pitch will be sent trhough this outlet.

entry.name: list
entry.description:
Out right outlet : velocity values from an input note list.
Out left outlet : pitch values from an input note list.
